item.title: Please let me drop everything and work on your problem Design
item.description: You know these situations at work when your boss or co-worker has a problem that needs to be addressed immediately and everything else be dropped. Make sure to encounter them with the right statement. / The design shows the funny and sarcastic saying...

item.title: READ THE FUCKING MANUAL - Black Text Design for Computer Geeks
item.description: RTFM is an initialism for the expression “read the fucking manual” or more in the context of the Unix computer operating system, “read the fucking man page”. It is usually expressed when the speaker is irritated by another...
